'''Thunderbolting Across the Land (I)''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to unlock all [[Teleport Waypoints]] in the [[Narukami Island]], [[Kannazuka]], and [[Yashiori Island]] areas of Inazuma.
